CustomField.description: Indicates whether to set the End Date of the Affiliation created with a Program Enrollment. If enabled, set the End Date to the Program Enrollment's End Date. If disabled, don't specify the Affiliation's End Date.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates whether to set the End Date of the Affiliation created with a Program Enrollment. If enabled, set the End Date to the Program Enrollment's End Date. If disabled, don't specify the Affiliation's End Date.
CustomField.label: Affil End Date Copy from Prog Enroll
